about_the_game:
Heroine Character Pack 3 contains 8 girl characters in school uniform, as well as an extra clothing variation for each girl, including Tshirt, detective, waitress, photographer, kimono, nun and more!

Following up on Heroine Character Pack 1 and Heroine Character Pack 2 created by Gee-Kun Soft, each character is designed to fit a common story archetype - from the pig-tailed school girl to the cute detective!

But it's up to you to decide just what role they're going to play. With matching Walking Sprites, Side-View animated Battlers, static Battlers, Facesets and Bust-Up images with emotions, you'll be able to choose if these heroines will be the party leaders or simply flesh out your world as NPCs.

FEATURES:

* 8 characters in school uniform and an extra fun outfit each (t-shirt, detective, waitress, long skirt, photographer, santa suit, kimono, nun)
* Walking character Sprites: 8 characters x 2 outfits = 16 sprites
* Front-facing Battlers (static): 8 x 13 variations x 2 outfits = 208 graphics
* Side-View animated Battlers: 8 x 2 outfits = 16 graphics
* Facesets: 8 x 8 emotions x 2 outfits = 128 graphics
* Bust-Up images: 8 x 8 emotions x 2 outfits = 128 graphics
* BONUS: Large-scale full-character graphic: 8 x 2 outfits = 16 graphics (3600 x 4800 pixel size)
* This pack is for use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel games or the engine of your choice. However, you may not sell your created game if it’s made with game development software other than the RPG Maker franchise or Visual Novel Maker.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker or the engine of your choice
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker ONLY
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Heroine Character Pack 3" and "RPG Maker MV - Heroine Character Pack 3" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
